contentencoded: Musician Conor Oberst gives us a topography lesson … A new movie – and fail-safe flirting tips – from actor Griffin Dunne… ’Freakonomics’ Stephen Dubner is your kryptonite …. Colson Whitehead becomes a gambling man … Inventing the futuristic fastener Velcro … Why bad words might be good for you … Annabelle Gurwitch finds lust in a hopeless place … And we inspect teff: a tiny grain with a huge upside.

title: Episode 253: Conor Oberst, Colson Whitehead, and Freakonomics
